.. _changelog:


***************************************
Change Log
***************************************

| **2.1.11**
| Changelog: 
| Threads optimisations (to limit OOMs) and bug fix
| 
| **2.1.2**
| Changelog: 
| Precaching, Lighter SDK, bug fix
| 
| **2.0.7**
| Changelog: 
| Fix DB, network, packageManager and various bugs.
| 
| **2.0.5**
| Changelog: 
| Bugfix
| 
| **2.0.3**
| Changelog: 
| Improvements on ContentProvider
| 
| **2.0.2**
| Changelog: 
| User data collection improvements
| 
| **1.8.3**
| Changelog: 
| Improvements for Video Ads, Fix on proguard warning, Minor Bugs fixing
|
|
|
